website_summaries.verdict: Offers the brand's healthy, fast cooking surfaces in a set designed to prepare ample portions and numerous types of dishes.
pros: A popular set thanks to the  generous cooking capacity of the 2 pans that are ideal for preparing large meals
Set includes an 11-inch deep square pan and a 12-inch round pan with tempered glass lids
Steam rack, fry basket, and recipe book add to the sets' versatility
cons: Due to its size, the round pan tends to cook a bit unevenly – hotter in the middle than around the diameter of the pan
A few reports of food sticking

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS product!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute wonderful product!! Easy breezy to clean and NO matter what you cook, your food never sticks!! * only downside* I wish you didn't have to buy all the other stuff (which we never used). Only needed the pots' (and/or) pans' + the matching top/covers. << I did noticed my round frying pan had a small dent on the inside-Presently appears solely cosmetic & has had NO ill effect w/ cooking performance ^^so that is why I still gave 4-Stars •Will update my review if this changes & spot becomes rusted >> I'm going to search for just the pan&cover set for my sister. Overall-FABULOUS item!!
customer_reviews.author: DoItRightThe1stTime

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not fit on the square pan. It's hard to turn food over in the round pans. The exterior gouged easily, and I don't know what did it. Instructions said don't use cooking spray so I usually use coconut oil to cook my eggs. They stick. Nothing else sticks but my eggs :(
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: FRY PAN STICKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM USING THE SQUARE PAN AS A DEEP FRYER. IT IS OK. BE CAREFUL NOT TO OVERFILL THE OIL. THE LID CANNOT GO ON WHILE FRYING CAUSING SPLATTERING. THE ROUND FRY PAN IS VERY DISAPPOINTING. THE FIRST FEW TIMES I USED IT NOTHING WOULD STICK TO IT AS ADVERTISED. I NOTICED AFTER A FEW USES, HOWEVER, THE ITEMS STARTED TO STICK. I EVEN ADDED OIL WHICH DID NOT HELP. THE ONLY WAY THAT I CAN CLEAN THIS POT NOW IS TO SOAK IT FOR A PERIOD OF TIME. (NOTE: I NEVER PUT THE PAN IN THE DISHWASHER OR USED ANY ABRASIVES ON IT). THEREFORE I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting non-stick surface
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter; I have had the same set myself for over a year. Has held up well. Remains nonstick. Great size for large meals. Both pans are deep dish. I would buy it again, but I don't have to, because it is lasting so well. Cooks evenly. Cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Cruze

customer_reviews.title: Quality product exceedes expectation
customer_reviews.text: Quality product,use these daily.exceeded expectaions beyond anything i could have imagined.have the entire set hanging from pot rack and they look awesome.they hold up to daily use with not even a sign of damage of any kind.no scratches anywhere top or bottom.heat distribution on the bottom is superior and makes cooking very easy and clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Capn longham

customer_reviews.title: Missing handle to wire basket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to give as Christmas gift . We had our Christmas today and the handle to the wire basket is missing . Where can I even find another handle , so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: janie moore

customer_reviews.title: I bought this Copper set for my wife on our ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Copper set for my wife on our 11th Anniversary and.... SHE LOVES IT! Woohoo, and guess what? She wants me to get her some more pots to add to the set 😏. However, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice nonstick pans!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I use the large pan for just about everything! No sticking and easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: Salted3

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Love the non-stick interior.
customer_reviews.text: We really love this product. We use less oils for cooking. The steamer tray did come with the feet, but I am afraid it might scratch the non-stick interior.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Got all pieces. There was a small plastic bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Got all pieces. There was a small plastic bag with 4 feet in it for the steamer. Will write more once we get to use set!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: No copper in Copper Chef.
customer_reviews.text: Would think buying something from Copper Chef that there would at least me some copper in the pans. Nope, kicker is there not even made with steel but aluminum and just feel super cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Garrison Foster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a gift and loved them so much that I ordered some for my parents!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyC

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a Birthday gift to my Mom ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Birthday gift to my Mom and she loves It! I am already a lover of this product. Thank you CopperChef!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worst product I had do return this 3 times in ...
customer_reviews.text: worst product I had do return this 3 times in one year. The copper is not the real thing!!!! It is sprayed on and falls off when you wash it. By hand or by dishwasher. scratches and is not copper as advertised. Also I paid 139.99 two months later it is 99.00 dollars and had to return it for a third time for same reasons. And price down to 89.00 dollars. Beware Company Mega City even wanted to and tried to charge a restocking fee for its life time warranty when replacing defective pieces. Do not buy ... Call BBB when dealing with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael LaChapelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this cooks and cleanup is even better..I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited to have kitchen ware that works with me. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: total crap.
customer_reviews.text: The cookware is used and beat to hell right out of the box. total crap.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Blake

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing, goes from the stove top to the oven and clean up is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kidd66

customer_reviews.title: A NECESSITY FOR ALL KITCHENS
customer_reviews.text: I am using this cookware for all my cooking now. So far, I have fried chicken, bacon, eggs, made soup, grilled cheese sandwiches, cooked vegetables, etc, etc. There is absolutely no sticking and there couldn't be a healthier way of eating. Imagine frying eggs without any oil or butter at all. Clean up is a breeze! I think this could become a necessity for all kitchens. Just remember that you CAN NOT use medal utensils with this cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best Copper (Ceramic) Coated Pots and Pans on the Market for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Copper coated pot/pan brands out there: These "Copper Chef" branded pots and pans IMHO are winners: WHY? 1. Quality Copper non-stick coating (aka Cerami-Tech). 2. Solid (durable) built pots and pans without being heavy feeling in the hand. 3. Plus the inclusion of an Induction Cooking Steel Bottom which adds to the solid build and reduces the warping of the pot/pan bottom. WRT Induction Cooking: Say Yes :-) to Induction Cooking and Say NO! to Microwaving your food. Read about Induction Cooking with real cooking flavor verses Microwaving (Zapping) your food into blandness.
customer_reviews.author: R H F

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made junk.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about these is the depth of the square pan. The square pan bottom is concave so it doesn't actually make contact with the burner since the corners are past the burner surface. We have never used metal products to store or flip food yet there are scratches all over the inside of pans. The large round pan cooking surface has already come off in places and is now useless for cooking. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nukes

customer_reviews.title: not the best or worst...
customer_reviews.text: large skillet has shown scratches from the start and some sticking...never use high heat as instructions clearly state not to. using plastic utensils has only saved the amount of longevity to this point. cast iron is still my go to in order to truly get non stick as well as be able to any kind of utensils. but the pans can boil water for pasta, sauces and gravy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca's

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the BIG ones unless you have a tribe to feed
customer_reviews.text: the large size , I bought both the round and square units, are really BIG . . . I would have been more comfortable with the 'regular' size . . . everything they say is true: cook great, clean-up is a breeze. The cookbook that they send with purchase leaves much to be desired, sucks. Cooking times, lid on or off? sometimes temp of oven: been a while since I opened the book
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy cleanup and the cooking variety. It's a little on the heavy side and I need the cookbook. The one that came with it is limited. Great looking, though.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Burger

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - These Pans Stick!
customer_reviews.text: Both round pans started sticking after a few times use. Pans have a raised center and do not cook evenly. Copper finish scratches easily and both pans have been taken out of use.
customer_reviews.author: Oran

customer_reviews.title: Great set of copper ware.
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. Wife loves the square pan as it is very deep. Works very well on induction top.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Moore

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are very lightweight, so they raise in the middle when placed on heat. Also, the square pans have a round ferrous (magnetic) plate for use on an induction cooktop. It's obvious that the corners of the pans will be much cooler than the center for extremely uneven cooking. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality out there and a great price! Gave another set for a gift and they love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Just make sure you use plastic
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just make sure you use plastic. Don't tap the metal part of the spoon etc on the edge. It will chip!
customer_reviews.author: dale williams

customer_reviews.title: Love love love the set
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the set, I got it for my daughter an son-in-law for christmas i'm sure they will enjoy it I enjoy my set.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca spellman

customer_reviews.title: Not Well Made
customer_reviews.text: CHEAPly made, lids don’t fit well. Not at all worth it...returning.
customer_reviews.author: NiccD

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. I already had this set, so purchased this one for my daughter (a health nut) so she could enjoy them too.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Trippies is a very good service my fiance and China and loves these copper ...
customer_reviews.text: Trippies is a very good service my fiance and China and loves these copper Chef pans she is very happy with him he's actually got him there before the date that they were supposed to be delivered I do appreciate you very much I will do a lot of business with thank you GPS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Copper Chef 11" XL Cookware set (7 PC)
product_meta.description: Copper Chef is changing cookware forever. America loves Copper Chef. The 5-Star Reviews say it all! Last year, the innovative, all-around square pan designed with state-of-the-art Cerami-Tech Nonstick Technology took the world by storm. Now, over 1 million people are cooking with Copper Chef. And it just got better! Introducing the newest addition to the Copper Chef Collection: the Copper Chef XL. It's the brand new, extra-large 11" square pan that's wider and deeper than ever before. It's designed with 60% more capacity so it's easy to cook even larger dishes for your family and friends. Cooking for big groups is nearly impossible in an ordinary round pan. Copper Chef XL's unique square design gives you that extra space you need. And now, it's even larger than before. Cook 3 racks of ribs easily— even a 12 lb. turkey! Plus, it's designed with Cerami-Tech Nonstick Technology so nothing sticks to the pan. The Stainless Steel Induction plate heats the pan rapidly from corner to corner so your meals cook in a flash. Now you can sauté, simmer, slow-cook, boil, fry & sear— all with just one amazing family-sized pan!
feature_bullets: 7 Piece Set Includes- 11" Deep Square Pan, Tempered Glass Lid, Fry Basket, Steam Rack, Recipe Book, 12" round Pan with Lid
Cook Faster and Healthier with 60% more capacity- PTFE & PTOA Free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars85 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
